name: skillgap-ai-system
description: Complete SkillGap AI System - Resume Analysis, Job Recommendations, and Learning Paths

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start

author: SkillGap AI Team
